titleStmt.title: Love and gallantry: or, A noble seaman's last adieu to his mistris at the time of his being unfortunately drowned in the last engagement with the Dutch. With her passionate answer thereunto. To the tune of, Farewel my Calista.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Phillip Brooksby, in West-Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Farewel my Cla[illegible] my life and my soul,".
Place of publication from and date conjectured by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
